paragraph: WRAPTEXT Walmart International CEO WRAPTEXT Thanks , Greg . WRAPTEXT I ’ m pleased with our progress this quarter in a challenging global WRAPTEXT economy . We ’ re delivering our strategy , seeing comp sales improve , and WRAPTEXT bringing in profit ahead of our expectations . Whilst our performance was WRAPTEXT driven by Walmex and Canada , our results reflect broad achievement . WRAPTEXT Nine of our eleven markets had positive comps this quarter and seven of WRAPTEXT our markets have now maintained positive comps for at least seven WRAPTEXT quarters in a row . We continue to see headwinds in the U.K. , China , and WRAPTEXT Brazil , which I ’ ll discuss more in a moment . WRAPTEXT We continue to execute on our strategic priorities , which are to : WRAPTEXT • Actively manage the existing portfolio WRAPTEXT • Deliver balanced growth WRAPTEXT • Be the lowest cost operator WRAPTEXT • And , build strong foundations in talent , trust , and technology WRAPTEXT In terms of the portfolio , we announced the closure of 115 small , WRAPTEXT underperforming stores in Brazil and other Latin American markets . Whilst WRAPTEXT these are difficult decisions for our markets and associates , it better WRAPTEXT positions us for growth in the right formats and geographies . Recently , we WRAPTEXT also announced that we ’ re pursuing the sale of our Suburbia apparel WRAPTEXT 15 WRAPTEXT business in Mexico and we ’ re in the process of selling our shopping centers WRAPTEXT in Chile . These are successful businesses , but aren ’ t a core part of our WRAPTEXT portfolio strategy . These changes would help drive greater simplicity to our WRAPTEXT operations and an increased focus on our strategic priorities . WRAPTEXT For balanced growth , I ’ m pleased with our comp trends and look WRAPTEXT forward to opening between 200 and 240 stores this year across our WRAPTEXT portfolio , while at the same time expanding our reach in e-commerce . WRAPTEXT Our lowest cost operator initiative is focused on two key areas - cost WRAPTEXT of goods sold ( COGS ) and overhead reductions . On cost of goods sold , WRAPTEXT we started a cost analytics program that provides improved tools and cost WRAPTEXT visibility to our merchants , which enables them to lead fact-based WRAPTEXT negotiations with suppliers . We ’ re pleased with early results from this WRAPTEXT program in Canada and the U.K. and will expand the program to additional WRAPTEXT markets later this year . WRAPTEXT Now , let ’ s discuss our overall results . In the fourth quarter , net sales WRAPTEXT grew 3.3 percent on a constant currency basis , slightly higher than last WRAPTEXT quarter . Reported net sales declined 9.7 percent , impacted by a $ 4.7 WRAPTEXT billion currency headwind from continued strength of the U.S. dollar . As WRAPTEXT mentioned , we had a strong quarter for comp sales . In our five largest WRAPTEXT markets , Mexico , Canada , and Brazil reported positive comps , while the WRAPTEXT U.K. and China reported negative comps . All other markets had solid , WRAPTEXT positive comp sales . WRAPTEXT Operating income declined 7.8 percent on a constant currency basis , WRAPTEXT negatively impacted by $ 215 million in charges ( $ 153 million on a reported WRAPTEXT basis ) related to previously announced store closures . Excluding this and WRAPTEXT certain other charges this year , such as restructuring costs , as well as last WRAPTEXT year store closure costs in Japan , operating income would have WRAPTEXT increased . On a reported basis , operating income declined 19.0 percent . WRAPTEXT On a constant currency basis , inventory grew faster than net sales at WRAPTEXT 4.2 percent . This increase was driven primarily by China , where inventory WRAPTEXT 16 WRAPTEXT increased in preparation for Chinese New Year . On a reported basis , WRAPTEXT inventory declined 10.2 percent . WRAPTEXT For the full year , net sales grew 3.2 percent on a constant currency WRAPTEXT basis , with improved comp sales , on top of 3.6 percent growth last year . WRAPTEXT Currency exchange rate fluctuations had a significant impact of $ 17.1 WRAPTEXT billion on our reported results , by far the largest one year impact in our WRAPTEXT history , resulting in a net sales decline of 9.4 percent on a reported basis . WRAPTEXT Full year operating income declined 1.0 percent on a constant currency WRAPTEXT basis , driven by store closures this quarter . Excluding this and last year WRAPTEXT store closure costs in Japan , operating income would have increased . On WRAPTEXT a reported basis , operating income declined 13.4 percent . WRAPTEXT Now let ’ s discuss fourth quarter results for our largest markets , WRAPTEXT presented on a constant currency basis . In all countries except Brazil and WRAPTEXT China , financial results are inclusive of e-commerce . WRAPTEXT Let ’ s start with Mexico , which was the biggest driver of this quarter ’ s WRAPTEXT results . Walmex released its earnings on February 16th under IFRS , while WRAPTEXT results here are under U.S. GAAP , so some numbers may differ . WRAPTEXT Walmex net sales increased 9.3 percent , with strong comp sales in WRAPTEXT both Mexico and Central America . Mexico net sales grew 9.7 percent and WRAPTEXT comp sales increased 8.6 percent , driven by increased customer spending WRAPTEXT and solid execution from our stores . Self-service was particularly strong , WRAPTEXT with comp sales of 8.8 percent , while the rest of the market , according to WRAPTEXT ANTAD , grew only 4.9 percent . Sam ’ s Club also had its best performance WRAPTEXT of the year , delivering comp sales of 7.0 percent , driven by strong sales WRAPTEXT from Advantage , or non-business , members . Operating income declined WRAPTEXT versus last year , driven by a planned reduction in our gross profit rate . WRAPTEXT Let ’ s next discuss Canada , which had another strong sales quarter . WRAPTEXT Net sales grew 5.8 percent , benefitting by strong customer traffic as a WRAPTEXT result of our improved fresh offer , continued price investments , and WRAPTEXT improvement in operational standards . Comp sales were 4.3 percent , our WRAPTEXT 17 WRAPTEXT seventh consecutive quarter in positive territory . I ’ m especially pleased WRAPTEXT with our sales in Canada , given the economic pressures in the oil- WRAPTEXT producing provinces . We had positive market share gains in food , WRAPTEXT consumables , and health and wellness , for the 12 weeks ended January WRAPTEXT 23rd , according to Nielsen . Our online sales continue to grow and perform WRAPTEXT well . Operating income was down versus last year , due to certain land WRAPTEXT impairments and pre-opening expenses for 13 previously announced stores WRAPTEXT acquired from a former competitor . Excluding these impacts , operating WRAPTEXT income would have been positive . WRAPTEXT Let ’ s talk now about the U.K. , which continues to face challenging WRAPTEXT market conditions . Grocery market sales fell 0.2 percent in the 12 weeks WRAPTEXT ended January 3rd , according to Kantar . This was driven by price deflation WRAPTEXT of 1.8 percent as a result of intense competition and was the 17th WRAPTEXT consecutive period with deflation . The big four grocers remained under WRAPTEXT pressure as discounters continued to grow and gain share . WRAPTEXT In the U.K. , we ’ re striking a balance between investment in the WRAPTEXT customer offer , profit , and cash flow . Overall , net sales declined 4.4 WRAPTEXT percent and comp sales , excluding fuel , were down 5.5 percent , driven by WRAPTEXT declines in our large store format and in our food business , partially offset WRAPTEXT by continued growth in online grocery . paragraph: WRAPTEXT Black Friday discounting , which impacted our comp sales , but helped WRAPTEXT profitability and allowed greater focus on operational standards and the WRAPTEXT customer offer in the core food business . We delivered strong cash WRAPTEXT performance as a result of disciplined management of capex and working WRAPTEXT capital . WRAPTEXT Asda is focused on repositioning its business through Project WRAPTEXT Renewal , which will simplify operations , lead to substantial reduction in WRAPTEXT costs , and allow for significant investments in customer value . As part of WRAPTEXT this project , we ’ re deploying a new cost analytics program to aid with WRAPTEXT buying . We ’ re also joining EMD , a European buying alliance , and we WRAPTEXT recently completed the purchase of two meat processing businesses . WRAPTEXT These actions will help increase buying efficiencies and remove costs from WRAPTEXT 18 WRAPTEXT the supply chain , particularly for private label products . The U.K. has also WRAPTEXT completed a restructuring of its Home Office aimed at increasing focus and WRAPTEXT improving operational agility . In addition , the U.K. will invest an additional WRAPTEXT £500 million in price during the period of its five year strategy , on top of the WRAPTEXT £1 billion previously committed . We ’ re taking aggressive actions and we ’ re WRAPTEXT focused on repositioning our offering to meet the changing needs of our WRAPTEXT customers . WRAPTEXT In China , despite ongoing economic challenges and slower GDP WRAPTEXT growth , we continue to gain share for the 12th consecutive quarter in the WRAPTEXT Hypermarket channel , according to Nielsen . Net sales grew 0.3 percent , WRAPTEXT driven by new store openings and improved performance from completed WRAPTEXT remodels . Comp sales fell 3.0 percent , in part , due to warmer weather and WRAPTEXT disappointing sales in winter seasonal categories . WRAPTEXT We continue to make progress in building a platform for sustainable WRAPTEXT growth in China . We ’ re benefitting from our earlier actions to centralize our WRAPTEXT buying offices and build out our supply chain . We ’ ve improved our gross WRAPTEXT margin rate and have realized benefits from productivity initiatives , while WRAPTEXT investing in labor and customer experience . We can see momentum WRAPTEXT building as performance in fresh has improved in recent quarters in both WRAPTEXT sales and margin . Operating income continues to grow faster than sales . WRAPTEXT The team in China is focused on delivering a trusted shopping WRAPTEXT experience through both physical and digital channels . We ’ re starting to WRAPTEXT see the benefits from tighter collaboration with Yihaodian . In Shenzhen WRAPTEXT and Guangzhou , Walmart now leverages Yihaodian ’ s last mile network for WRAPTEXT online orders , which has led to greater delivery capacity . Overall , we ’ re WRAPTEXT excited about the actions we ’ re taking in China that are setting us up for WRAPTEXT long term growth . WRAPTEXT In Brazil , we continue to face political and economic instability . The WRAPTEXT deterioration in the macro environment , combined with persistent , high WRAPTEXT inflation continues to put a strain on customers . Net sales grew 1.2 percent WRAPTEXT and comps grew 0.8 percent , in a retail market that contracted by 5.7 WRAPTEXT 19 WRAPTEXT percent , according to Serasa Experian . We were encouraged by another WRAPTEXT quarter of double digit growth in our wholesale business , mostly offset by WRAPTEXT continued softness in the hypermarket format . Operating income was WRAPTEXT down versus last year , driven by the cost to close the 60 stores announced WRAPTEXT earlier . Excluding store closure costs , operating income would have been WRAPTEXT relatively flat to last year . WRAPTEXT We ’ re seeing positive results from some of our transformation WRAPTEXT initiatives , such as repositioning the customer proposition in our wholesale WRAPTEXT business , but there ’ s still work to be done . Brazil ’ s focus for the year ahead WRAPTEXT will be to finalize store closures , revise and reposition the customer WRAPTEXT proposition for our hypermarket format , and complete the integration of WRAPTEXT systems and processes in our stores . We are committed to turnaround WRAPTEXT efforts in this important market . WRAPTEXT As I wrap up , I ’ d like to recognize the efforts of our dedicated WRAPTEXT international associates operating in 28 countries around the globe that WRAPTEXT helped us achieve consistently good results throughout the year . I ’ m WRAPTEXT confident in the management teams we have leading our markets and the WRAPTEXT strategic priorities we have in place to drive further growth in the year WRAPTEXT ahead . WRAPTEXT Now , I ’ ll turn it over to Roz for the update on Sam ’ s . Roz…

paragraph: WRAPTEXT Rosalind Brewer WRAPTEXT Sam ’ s Club WRAPTEXT Thanks , Dave . WRAPTEXT I ’ ll start today ’ s call with details around our fourth quarter WRAPTEXT performance . I ’ ll also provide an update on how we have begun to execute WRAPTEXT against the strategy that I detailed during our third quarter earnings call . At WRAPTEXT Sam ’ s Club , we remain laser focused on our members . Through WRAPTEXT investments we 've made , and will continue to make , in people and WRAPTEXT 20 WRAPTEXT technology , we will deliver for our members a seamless shopping WRAPTEXT experience across our app , our site and our clubs . WRAPTEXT Let ’ s begin by talking about our fourth quarter results . It ’ s important WRAPTEXT to note that our reported results were negatively impacted by certain WRAPTEXT charges totaling approximately $ 77 million . This amount includes a charge WRAPTEXT of approximately $ 57 million resulting from our decision to close under- WRAPTEXT performing clubs . The remainder of the charges includes a policy change WRAPTEXT related to paid time off , as well as severance and other costs associated WRAPTEXT with recently announced organizational enhancements . WRAPTEXT Unless otherwise noted , today ’ s financial discussion will exclude fuel WRAPTEXT for purposes of comparability . For results with fuel and additional WRAPTEXT information , please refer to the accompanying presentation posted with this WRAPTEXT transcript . WRAPTEXT Comp sales for the fourth quarter were below our expectations . WRAPTEXT Severe winter storms significantly disrupted approximately 200 clubs WRAPTEXT towards the end of the quarter , which resulted in a negative impact to the WRAPTEXT comp of approximately 30 basis points . That said , we know that our core WRAPTEXT comp performance can improve - and it will . The work we have underway , WRAPTEXT which I ’ ll talk about in just a bit is designed in part to improve the WRAPTEXT fundamentals of our business , specifically membership and merchandising . WRAPTEXT Broadly speaking , trends that we saw throughout the year were again WRAPTEXT prevalent during the quarter . Among the most notable items were : WRAPTEXT • Softness in food primarily as a result of a minimal level of inflation , WRAPTEXT or in some instances , deflation in key categories . WRAPTEXT • An impact to grocery as we begin to evolve the assortment , and… WRAPTEXT • Challenges in the technology and entertainment area from a WRAPTEXT deliberate transition in space reallocation , along with pressures in WRAPTEXT wireless . WRAPTEXT 21 WRAPTEXT Yet , we know that where we have seen innovation in the assortment WRAPTEXT and in service offerings - we have seen success . I ’ ll talk more about our WRAPTEXT merchandise categories in a moment . WRAPTEXT Net sales decreased 0.1 percent , as comp sales declined 0.5 WRAPTEXT percent . Slide 10 of the financial presentation provides the components of WRAPTEXT our comp sales . We were pleased with the performance of our Savings WRAPTEXT members , as positive momentum in traffic continued , but softness from our WRAPTEXT Business member negatively impacted our results . WRAPTEXT Gross profit rate decreased four basis points from last year . We WRAPTEXT continued to invest in membership value through price and our cash WRAPTEXT rewards program . WRAPTEXT Operating expenses deleveraged during the quarter . As expected , WRAPTEXT investments in people and technology pressured our expenses . WRAPTEXT Additionally , charges for the items I mentioned earlier impacted Q4 . WRAPTEXT Excluding these items , operating expense as a percentage of net sales was WRAPTEXT relatively flat compared with last year . WRAPTEXT Membership income increased 5.6 percent during Q4 . Plus renewals WRAPTEXT increased 35 percent over last year , and we continued to see a favorable WRAPTEXT trend of renewal rates for Plus members . The value of a Sam ’ s Club WRAPTEXT membership is clear . Our targeted marketing programs resulted in new WRAPTEXT membership acquisitions that accelerated each of the last three quarters WRAPTEXT versus last year . WRAPTEXT Let ’ s turn now to our merchandising categories . I ’ ll provide details on WRAPTEXT areas that were materially impactful to the quarter . Please see slide 11 of WRAPTEXT the accompanying presentation for the comp performance of the remaining WRAPTEXT categories . WRAPTEXT In fresh/freezer/cooler deflationary trends continued particularly in WRAPTEXT fresh meat and dairy . We saw positive results in produce , yet headwinds WRAPTEXT from the remainder of the category proved too much to overcome . WRAPTEXT 22 WRAPTEXT Dry grocery and areas of fresh experienced pressures from deflation . WRAPTEXT As we continue to expand our private brand , generate more newness , and WRAPTEXT reallocate space , these areas are gaining member acceptance but will take WRAPTEXT careful handling and coordination . WRAPTEXT Technology/entertainment/office had some bright spots with new WRAPTEXT items in TVs and wearables , both of which performed well online and in WRAPTEXT clubs . Wireless installment plans continue to place pressure on the WRAPTEXT category . WRAPTEXT When we innovate , we see good results . In health & wellness and WRAPTEXT consumables our Free/4/10 Plus benefit program in pharmacy is helping to WRAPTEXT lift the total category . Services are important to our members , and they WRAPTEXT reward us when we deliver in this space . The technology services WRAPTEXT company IMS Health measures our market share of the five free scripts in WRAPTEXT the program . According to IMS , we grew share by 11 basis points for the WRAPTEXT three months ended Dec. 31 , 2015 , and our share is nearly 25 basis points WRAPTEXT higher than it was prior to the launch of the program . Free/4/10 was also a WRAPTEXT strong contributor to membership upgrades to Plus since the beginning of WRAPTEXT the fiscal year . WRAPTEXT Moving on to e-commerce - this year we made the decision to push WRAPTEXT many of our holiday events online , and we were pleased with the response WRAPTEXT from our members . Our Holiday Savings Celebration on Nov. 14 drove WRAPTEXT good results , and we were pleased with other events , including Cyber WRAPTEXT Monday . During the quarter , traffic to our site increased by seven percent WRAPTEXT versus the prior year , and the conversion improved by 18 percent . WRAPTEXT We continue to be pleased with the progress we ’ re making in our WRAPTEXT pure e-commerce and mobile commerce capabilities . We ’ re also excited WRAPTEXT about the integration of our digital and physical offerings . During Q4 , Club WRAPTEXT Pickup increased 46 percent over last year , and it now represents the WRAPTEXT fastest growing piece of our business . Members want to shop with Sam ’ s WRAPTEXT Club how and where they choose , and we are building the infrastructure WRAPTEXT across multiple channels to deliver that experience . WRAPTEXT 23 WRAPTEXT On our call from Q3 , I talked about a new strategy . During Q4 , we WRAPTEXT began to execute against that strategy in important ways , including : WRAPTEXT • Additional organizational enhancements that will better align talent WRAPTEXT with critical needs . WRAPTEXT • Portfolio management through the closure of under-performing clubs . WRAPTEXT • An extensive review of merchandise categories , and… . WRAPTEXT • The expansion of private label brands in key areas . WRAPTEXT These are only a few examples , and we have many other work WRAPTEXT streams underway . The totality of these efforts will address the WRAPTEXT fundamentals of our business , including membership and merchandising , WRAPTEXT as well as deliver new services and offerings . WRAPTEXT As I think about guidance for the first quarter , I ’ m reminded that , WRAPTEXT although we have accomplished a great deal over the previous months , it WRAPTEXT remains early days in our transformation . As a result , comp sales , without WRAPTEXT fuel , for the 13-week period ending April 29 , 2016 are expected to be WRAPTEXT around flat . WRAPTEXT Let me close today with a few thoughts… WRAPTEXT • First , the new alignment of our organization will position the business WRAPTEXT to better serve our members . It was a significant step in our WRAPTEXT transformation , and we will begin to see the benefits in the coming WRAPTEXT quarter . WRAPTEXT • Secondly , our new Chief Merchandising Officer has conducted a WRAPTEXT comprehensive review of our merchandise based on identified WRAPTEXT markets and what he has gleaned from our strategy work . We ’ re WRAPTEXT excited about his early insights at this stage . WRAPTEXT • I 'm confident we 're taking the business in the right direction now and WRAPTEXT for the future WRAPTEXT • Through a disciplined , refined approach to growth we will deliver for WRAPTEXT our members a seamless shopping experience across app , site & WRAPTEXT club . WRAPTEXT Now , I 'll turn the call over to Neil . Neil ... WRAPTEXT 24

paragraph: WRAPTEXT Thanks Neil . WRAPTEXT I ’ ll wrap up today by providing some thoughts on the company ’ s WRAPTEXT performance in fiscal year 2016 , as well as our expectations for fiscal year WRAPTEXT 2017 . WRAPTEXT Before we jump into guidance , I want to highlight a few items from the WRAPTEXT quarter and the year . Overall , we are pleased with the way we ended fiscal WRAPTEXT year 2016 . WRAPTEXT • In the fourth quarter , Walmart U.S. comp sales increased 0.6 percent , WRAPTEXT representing the 6th consecutive quarter of positive comp sales and the WRAPTEXT 5th straight quarter of positive traffic . WRAPTEXT • For the year , Walmart International delivered another solid financial WRAPTEXT performance , with very strong results in Canada and at Walmex . WRAPTEXT • We generated full year constant currency revenue growth of nearly $ 14 WRAPTEXT billion or 2.8 % . Currency impacted our full year revenue by over $ 17 WRAPTEXT billion . WRAPTEXT • We continue to innovate and make progress toward a seamless WRAPTEXT shopping experience through a number of initiatives , including an WRAPTEXT increased number of on-line grocery markets . While we would have WRAPTEXT liked to have seen higher e-commerce sales growth this quarter , we WRAPTEXT continue to make good , foundational progress for the future . WRAPTEXT 29 WRAPTEXT • For the year , we generated approximately $ 27 billion in operating cash WRAPTEXT flow which speaks to our continued financial strength as we transform WRAPTEXT the company . I ’ m particularly pleased with our inventory performance in

paragraph: WRAPTEXT Wal-Mart Stores , Inc. President & CEO WRAPTEXT Thanks , Pauline , and good morning everyone . Thank you for joining WRAPTEXT us to hear more about our first quarter results and an update on our overall WRAPTEXT strategy . WRAPTEXT We ’ re off to a good start to the fiscal year . For the first quarter , EPS was WRAPTEXT $ 0.98 , which is above the top end of our guidance . Excluding the $ 3.5 WRAPTEXT billion currency impact , we delivered total revenue of $ 119.4 billion , which WRAPTEXT is growth of $ 4.6 billion , or 4.0 percent , over last year . On a reported basis , WRAPTEXT total revenue increased 0.9 percent to $ 115.9 billion . We exceeded both WRAPTEXT our EPS and Walmart U.S. comp sales guidance . WRAPTEXT As we described in October , we 're improving our stores , adding critical WRAPTEXT capabilities , and deepening relationships with customers . We are WRAPTEXT encouraged by the Walmart U.S. comp and believe it ’ s attributable to real WRAPTEXT improvement in our store experience . Our customers are giving us positive WRAPTEXT feedback . I 'm seeing it myself on store visits and you can see it in the WRAPTEXT traffic numbers . WRAPTEXT We delivered comp sales of 1 percent in Walmart U.S. due to continuing WRAPTEXT traffic increases , which improved 1.5 percent this quarter . This was our 7th WRAPTEXT consecutive quarter of positive comp sales , and our 6th consecutive WRAPTEXT quarter of positive comp traffic . WRAPTEXT It ’ s exciting to see the improvement in core retail fundamentals . For WRAPTEXT example , I ’ m encouraged by the progress we ’ re making on inventory . That WRAPTEXT progress is important in its own right and for cash flow purposes , but it can WRAPTEXT also help create a virtuous loop . When combined with our investments in WRAPTEXT training and associate education , wages , and store structure , it ’ s giving our WRAPTEXT associates more time on the sales floor to serve customers . WRAPTEXT 3 WRAPTEXT Our customer satisfaction scores have continued to strengthen and our WRAPTEXT in-stock has gotten better . Our associates are responding and I ’ m proud of WRAPTEXT them , Greg Foran and the entire U.S. leadership team . WRAPTEXT In the quarter we did a better job of managing costs . SG & A discipline WRAPTEXT improved , as our store teams did a good job of more closely aligning WRAPTEXT expenses with sales growth . Better expense management in the quarter WRAPTEXT gave us increased confidence to initiate our next phase of U.S. price WRAPTEXT investment earlier than planned . Over time , we intend to lower prices WRAPTEXT further in a deliberate , strategic way to drive our productivity loop . Doing WRAPTEXT this in a sustainable way takes time and we 're seeing progress . WRAPTEXT Globally , on a constant currency basis , e-commerce sales and GMV WRAPTEXT grew 7 percent and 7.5 percent , respectively . Growth here is too slow . The WRAPTEXT U.S. number is better than the global number but neither is as high as we 'd WRAPTEXT like . We can see progress against several of the necessary capabilities we WRAPTEXT need to win in e-commerce but we 're still working on a few others . We WRAPTEXT need them all to come together to see stronger growth . For example , our WRAPTEXT marketplace is ramping up but it takes time to build the assortment to the WRAPTEXT point where customers realize the depth of assortment . We now offer more WRAPTEXT than 10 million SKUs on Walmart.com and we are growing that number WRAPTEXT through a combination of first-party and third-party items . It makes sense WRAPTEXT that perception will trail reality and we 'll work on both during the course of WRAPTEXT this year . WRAPTEXT We 'll build on the successes we 've seen around the world , including in WRAPTEXT the U.S. , and we 'll continue to work through the challenges we 've WRAPTEXT experienced in key markets like Brazil , China and the U.K. where our e- WRAPTEXT commerce and mobile commerce sales are softer . WRAPTEXT We 're pleased with our e-commerce operating system and happy to WRAPTEXT have our new e-commerce fulfillment centers operational . Those are WRAPTEXT necessary building blocks . I ’ m excited about the ways we ’ re using WRAPTEXT technology to deepen our relationships with customers and help them save WRAPTEXT both money and time . WRAPTEXT 4 WRAPTEXT Our grocery pickup service in the U.S. continues to receive high marks WRAPTEXT from customers , and we ’ re continuing to expand it . I ’ m pleased to share WRAPTEXT we ’ re announcing 9 new markets today , bringing our total number of WRAPTEXT markets to nearly 40 by the end of this month . In addition , in some WRAPTEXT markets , we ’ ll double the number of stores that offer the service locally in WRAPTEXT May . We expect to continue to quickly expand to new markets . WRAPTEXT The Walmart app is also allowing us to serve customers in convenient WRAPTEXT ways , whether it ’ s by finding an item in store , researching a product , or WRAPTEXT refilling a prescription . Walmart Pay is enhancing our ability to provide a WRAPTEXT seamless shopping experience as customers quickly pay with their phone . WRAPTEXT A few weeks ago we began to expand this service nationwide , and we ’ re on WRAPTEXT schedule to complete the rollout by the end of June .

paragraph: WRAPTEXT Walmart International had a strong start to the year , with ten of our 11 WRAPTEXT markets posting positive comp sales and nine of those markets growing WRAPTEXT comp sales by more than four percent on a constant currency basis . In WRAPTEXT particular , Walmex and Canada continue to perform well , with strong sales , WRAPTEXT market share gains , and solid profit performance . China remains a WRAPTEXT strategic market for our future and is now our 4th largest international WRAPTEXT market from a sales standpoint . We recently held a board of directors WRAPTEXT meeting in China , and while visiting stores and e-commerce operations , I WRAPTEXT continue to be encouraged by the pace of operational improvements made WRAPTEXT by our team in China . WRAPTEXT A highly competitive environment , and food deflation in the U.K. WRAPTEXT continued to challenge the market , significantly impacting traffic and comp WRAPTEXT sales trends in our business . We ’ re focused on making strategic WRAPTEXT investments to improve our position in the market and invest in price , while WRAPTEXT being diligent in managing our bottom line and cash flow . WRAPTEXT 5 WRAPTEXT At Sam ’ s Club , we are pleased with the growth in membership income . WRAPTEXT Plus member penetration is near an all-time high , and we like the trend WRAPTEXT we ’ re seeing . It ’ s clear that members recognize the value that a Plus WRAPTEXT membership brings . Comp sales for the period were in-line with our WRAPTEXT guidance , but we know we can deliver stronger results . Leading in digital is WRAPTEXT a focus area for Sam ’ s , and the team is doing a good job of delivering for WRAPTEXT members as we continue to see strong growth in Club Pickup . WRAPTEXT Finally , we look forward to welcoming many of our shareholders , WRAPTEXT investors and associates to Northwest Arkansas in a few weeks for our WRAPTEXT annual meeting . This is one of my favorite weeks of the year , as we get a WRAPTEXT chance to connect with you and share more of our thinking about the WRAPTEXT business . We also bring in associates from around the world , it ’ s inspiring WRAPTEXT to see them and hear their stories . We hope you ’ ll join us for a great WRAPTEXT meeting . WRAPTEXT In summary , we are continuing to do what we said we ’ d do on our WRAPTEXT strategic plan , and we are getting traction as a result . WRAPTEXT Now , I ’ ll turn it over to Brett .

paragraph: WRAPTEXT Walmart International had a strong start to the year despite some continuing WRAPTEXT challenges in certain markets . As a reminder , in all countries except Brazil and WRAPTEXT China , our financial results are inclusive of our e-commerce performance . WRAPTEXT Comp sales remain strong with all markets other than the U.K. posting positive WRAPTEXT comp sales . Also worth mentioning , 9 of our markets grew comp sales by more WRAPTEXT than four percent on a constant currency basis . This year , Easter benefited the first WRAPTEXT quarter some in international , as the holiday last year fell within the second WRAPTEXT quarter , given the one month reporting lag in all markets except Canada . paragraph: WRAPTEXT Marc Lore - Wal-Mart Stores Inc. - President , CEO , Wal-Mart eCommerce WRAPTEXT And regarding what we 're doing with fresh at Jet . So I think fresh for Walmart and Jet together is going to be a critical part of the strategy going forward , a really big WRAPTEXT focus on consumables and food . And we 're experimenting with different ways to get food to the consumer . So right now , on Jet , we are shipping direct to the home WRAPTEXT from a centralized DC , about 15 million people we 're serving right now and we 'll continue to expand that . At the same time , you have the acceleration happening in WRAPTEXT online grocery pickup at a Walmart store . And so one thing is for sure , we 're going to be really focused on winning in fresh and consumables over the next couple of WRAPTEXT years . And we 're just not quite sure what the final best way to do it is , but we 're experimenting .

paragraph: WRAPTEXT Simeon Gutman , Morgan Stanley . A question on comps . I think the comp run rate of the business has been implicitly raised , more of the onus on the sales growth WRAPTEXT coming from comp . My question is , why could n't -- or why should n't comps run at 2 % -plus going forward ? The business has momentum . Deflation may be bottoming . WRAPTEXT You have some merchandising activities . Jet seems to be an accelerant to that growth . Why should n't we think of 2 % -plus being the new normal ?

paragraph: WRAPTEXT Wal-Mart Stores , Inc. President & CEO WRAPTEXT Thanks , Steve , and good morning everyone . As you saw in our earnings WRAPTEXT release this morning , we delivered another solid quarter and are pleased with the WRAPTEXT continued momentum in the business . Our associates are doing a good job and it ’ s WRAPTEXT much appreciated . I ’ ll discuss the details in a minute but I ’ d like to start by thanking WRAPTEXT everyone who came to Bentonville for our Meeting in WRAPTEXT October . We enjoyed giving you an update on our plans going forward . We have a WRAPTEXT strong company ; we ’ re executing well in our stores and making strategic investments WRAPTEXT in e-commerce to accelerate growth . We ’ re gaining traction and moving faster to WRAPTEXT better serve our customers every day . WRAPTEXT When we were together last month , I outlined four priorities : WRAPTEXT Make every day easier for busy families WRAPTEXT Operate with discipline WRAPTEXT Be the most trusted retailer , and WRAPTEXT Deliver results and position the company to win . WRAPTEXT By executing on these priorities , the customer – and our shareholders - will benefit . WRAPTEXT To start , I ’ d like to highlight some recent developments in e-commerce that WRAPTEXT demonstrate how we ’ re moving faster and making every day easier for busy families . WRAPTEXT First , we ’ re excited to see Walmart.com gaining traction . From a marketplace WRAPTEXT perspective , we ’ re scaling fast – adding 8 million SKUs over the past 3 months WRAPTEXT alone . E-commerce contributed 50 basis points to our Q3 Walmart U.S. comp , which WRAPTEXT is our largest contribution yet . It ’ s great to see an improving e-commerce business WRAPTEXT compliment the momentum we have in our stores . WRAPTEXT Next , we recently completed the acquisition of Jet.com and we ’ re excited to WRAPTEXT have Marc Lore as a member of our leadership team driving U.S. e-commerce for WRAPTEXT Walmart and Jet.com . One of the reasons Jet.com makes sense for Walmart is the WRAPTEXT common ground we share with basket economics . Walmart ’ s advantage has always WRAPTEXT been in providing the lowest prices on a basket of goods , and Jet has created a WRAPTEXT unique way to deliver the lowest cost basket online . When customers build a bigger WRAPTEXT basket online , the economics work in their favor and in ours . Marc has hit the ground WRAPTEXT 2 WRAPTEXT running since the acquisition was finalized . We immediately set up teams to WRAPTEXT accelerate our integration efforts and are working hard to leverage our strengths— WRAPTEXT such as optimizing our combined fulfillment networks , utilizing our scale in areas like WRAPTEXT shipping , sharing our assortment and leveraging the strengths of our marketing WRAPTEXT teams . We ’ re excited to reap the benefits of our combined businesses and we look WRAPTEXT forward to updating you on our progress going forward . WRAPTEXT I ’ m also excited by how we ’ ve positioned our business in China to win . We WRAPTEXT continue to be pleased with how our alliance with JD.com allows us to reach even WRAPTEXT more customers with our brands . We recently announced we own roughly 10 WRAPTEXT percent of JD.com ’ s shares and during my visit a few weeks ago we jointly launched WRAPTEXT two new services . Our Sam ’ s Club flagship store launched on JD ’ s website – WRAPTEXT providing hundreds of millions of customers access to Sam ’ s Club ’ s premium WRAPTEXT products with JD same-day and next-day delivery service . We also announced an WRAPTEXT exclusive Walmart Global imports store on JD.com Worldwide , the company ’ s cross- WRAPTEXT border platform . The new store provides Chinese consumers access to Walmart ’ s WRAPTEXT selection of thousands of products imported from Walmart stores around the world . WRAPTEXT We ’ re working together with them to create a seamless shopping experience . I was WRAPTEXT able to visit the JD Home Office when I was in China last month and it was clear that WRAPTEXT they work with speed and the spirit of innovation is strong . When I was in one of our WRAPTEXT Walmart hypermarkets in Beijing , JD already had a site set up for picking and WRAPTEXT delivering customer orders . WRAPTEXT We also announced an investment in New Dada , China ’ s largest local on- WRAPTEXT demand logistics and grocery online to offline , or “ O2O , ” seamless e-commerce WRAPTEXT platform . Already , New Dada is enabling two-hour delivery service from more than WRAPTEXT 45 Walmart locations . It ’ s amazing to see how O2O is changing how Chinese WRAPTEXT consumers shop . Densely populated cities and favorable delivery economics enable WRAPTEXT two-hour delivery and we look to expand the number of locations using New Dada WRAPTEXT for two-hour delivery going forward . WRAPTEXT We ’ re moving faster to position the company to win – and we ’ re doing this from WRAPTEXT a position of increasing strength . WRAPTEXT Now , I ’ d like to move to our third quarter results , where we delivered another WRAPTEXT solid quarter with earnings per share of $ 0.98 . Excluding the $ 2.1 billion currency WRAPTEXT 3 WRAPTEXT impact , we delivered total revenue of $ 120.3 billion , an increase of 2.5 percent over WRAPTEXT last year . WRAPTEXT Comp store sales grew 1.2 percent in Walmart U.S. , driven by a traffic WRAPTEXT increase of 0.7 percent . Greg Foran , our U.S. leadership team and our associates WRAPTEXT continue to execute our plan to win , and it ’ s working . Our customer satisfaction WRAPTEXT scores continue to improve , and the team did a great job of managing the flow of WRAPTEXT inventory again this quarter . Comp store inventory was down approximately 6 WRAPTEXT percent and in-stock levels are up . WRAPTEXT We also continued to show progress in e-commerce . On a constant currency WRAPTEXT basis , global e-commerce sales and GMV increased 20.6 percent and 16.8 percent WRAPTEXT respectively . The U.S. results were stronger than those in our key international WRAPTEXT markets , driven by our marketplace offering as I mentioned earlier , as well as a WRAPTEXT contribution from Jet.com . We continue to roll out online grocery and grow our pick- WRAPTEXT up business in stores and clubs . We ’ re making progress giving our customers the WRAPTEXT seamless shopping experience they are looking for .

paragraph: WRAPTEXT Walmart U.S. net sales increased 2.5 percent , or more than $ 1.8 billion . This WRAPTEXT growth comes despite persistent market deflation in food , which negatively impacted WRAPTEXT our Food comp by approximately 150 basis points , as well as unseasonably warm WRAPTEXT 8 WRAPTEXT weather in the back half of the quarter . Comp sales increased 1.2 percent driven by WRAPTEXT a 0.7 percent increase in customer traffic . On a two-year stack basis , comp traffic WRAPTEXT was up 2.4 percent , which was relatively consistent with the first two quarters of the WRAPTEXT year . E-commerce contributed approximately 50 basis points to the segment comp , WRAPTEXT which was an acceleration from the second quarter . WRAPTEXT Also , all store formats had positive comp sales , including Neighborhood WRAPTEXT Markets which delivered comp sales growth of approximately 5.2 percent . WRAPTEXT Gross margin increased 32 basis points . Savings from procuring merchandise WRAPTEXT contributed to margin rate improvement in General Merchandise , Food , and WRAPTEXT Consumables . In addition , transportation-related fuel cost savings favorably WRAPTEXT impacted results . These factors , which reduced cost of goods sold , were partially WRAPTEXT offset by the continued implementation of our multi-year strategy of incremental price WRAPTEXT investment . WRAPTEXT Operating expenses increased 8.6 percent primarily due to the previously WRAPTEXT announced associate wage rate increases , as well as investments in technology . In WRAPTEXT addition , we lapped the lease accounting adjustment that I mentioned earlier , which WRAPTEXT benefitted last year ’ s U.S. third quarter results . WRAPTEXT As a result , operating income declined 11.3 percent for the quarter . Excluding WRAPTEXT last year ’ s lease accounting adjustment , operating income would have declined 9.8 WRAPTEXT percent . WRAPTEXT We continue to do a good job with inventory while maintaining high in-stock WRAPTEXT levels . In the third quarter , inventory declined 2 percent , with comp store inventory WRAPTEXT down approximately 6 percent . WRAPTEXT We continue to execute our plan and are making good progress delivering a WRAPTEXT better experience for our customers . We ’ re pleased with the underlying momentum WRAPTEXT in the business and feel good about our plans for the fourth quarter . We ’ re well- WRAPTEXT positioned for holiday with newness , exciting gift items , and EDLP throughout the WRAPTEXT assortment . All the pieces are in place to ensure a great shopping experience in our WRAPTEXT stores and online . WRAPTEXT 9 WRAPTEXT For the 13-week period ending January 27 , 2017 , we expect a comp sales WRAPTEXT increase of between 1.0 and 1.5 percent . WRAPTEXT Now , let ’ s move to Walmart International .

paragraph: WRAPTEXT Walmart International continues to deliver solid results . This quarter 10 of our WRAPTEXT 11 markets posted positive comp sales and seven of those markets grew comps by WRAPTEXT more than four percent . Walmex continued to lead the way with comp sales growth WRAPTEXT of 7 percent , representing a two-year comp growth of nearly 13 percent . WRAPTEXT Our positive comp sales trend again this quarter is a continuation of what we WRAPTEXT have seen over the last several years . We will continue to focus on driving growth WRAPTEXT through our fresh offering , expanding online grocery and private brands . WRAPTEXT With that , let ’ s discuss International ’ s overall results . WRAPTEXT Net sales grew 2.4 percent on a constant currency basis , while reported net WRAPTEXT sales declined 4.8 percent due to a $ 2.1 billion currency impact . WRAPTEXT Operating income increased 11.2 percent on a constant currency basis . On a WRAPTEXT reported basis , operating income increased 1.2 percent . In the quarter , there was a WRAPTEXT gain from the sale of several shopping malls in Chile . Also , recall that in the third WRAPTEXT quarter last year , we had a favorable impact from a lease accounting adjustment . WRAPTEXT Excluding both of these items , operating income increased 9.4 percent on a constant WRAPTEXT currency basis . We expect a similar gain in the fourth quarter reflecting the WRAPTEXT completion of the sale of the remaining shopping malls in Chile . WRAPTEXT Let ’ s now turn to some brief highlights of our key markets . Please note that the WRAPTEXT accompanying financial presentation includes detailed information on our five major WRAPTEXT markets . As a reminder , in all countries except Brazil and China our financial results WRAPTEXT are inclusive of e-commerce . Additionally , the results discussed below are on a WRAPTEXT constant currency basis . WRAPTEXT 10 WRAPTEXT Let ’ s begin with Walmex which released its earnings on October 25th . Keep in WRAPTEXT mind that Walmex releases results under IFRS and the results discussed here are WRAPTEXT under U.S. GAAP , therefore some results may differ . The positive momentum in the WRAPTEXT business continued across all formats , divisions , and countries . Comp sales for WRAPTEXT Walmex increased 7 percent in the quarter and total sales increased nearly 9 WRAPTEXT percent . In Mexico , comp sales increased 7.3 percent and continued to outpace the WRAPTEXT rest of the self-service market , according to ANTAD . In addition , Walmex did a good WRAPTEXT job managing inventory which grew at a slower rate than sales growth . WRAPTEXT In Canada , net sales increased 3.3 percent and comp sales increased 1.1 WRAPTEXT percent . Comp sales have now been positive for ten consecutive quarters and , WRAPTEXT according to Nielsen , we continued to gain market share in food and consumables & WRAPTEXT health and wellness . Our cost analytics program continues in helping drive down WRAPTEXT cost of goods allowing us to invest in price . In Canada , we also reduced inventory WRAPTEXT levels even as sales increased . WRAPTEXT Turning to the U.K. , net sales declined 3.8 percent and comp sales declined WRAPTEXT 5.8 percent in the third quarter . The key priority remains driving an improved WRAPTEXT customer experience and building sales momentum by simplifying the offer , WRAPTEXT improving product availability and making strategic investments in service and price . WRAPTEXT We are moving with pace as we address our customer value proposition in the WRAPTEXT market . WRAPTEXT In China , net sales grew 4.2 percent and comp sales increased 1.6 percent WRAPTEXT this quarter . The key drivers of the performance were strong seasonal and festive WRAPTEXT categories during the Mid-Autumn Festival and a strong performance in fresh WRAPTEXT categories , an on-going focus area for us in China . As Doug mentioned , through our WRAPTEXT recent alliance with JD.com , we continue to offer exciting new ways for customers to WRAPTEXT access high-quality products from around the world . WRAPTEXT It was another solid performance from Walmart International . WRAPTEXT Now , let ’ s turn to Sam ’ s Club . WRAPTEXT 11 WRAPTEXT Sam ’ s Club WRAPTEXT Excluding fuel , net sales and comp sales increased 1.8 percent and 1.4 WRAPTEXT percent , respectively , and membership income grew by 2.3 percent . Market WRAPTEXT deflation , primarily in food , negatively impacted comp sales by approximately 110 WRAPTEXT basis points versus last year . E-commerce performed well and contributed WRAPTEXT approximately 60 basis points to the comp growth . WRAPTEXT Operating income , including fuel , declined year over year by approximately 27 WRAPTEXT percent , primarily as a result of an increase in operating expenses , including planned WRAPTEXT investments in people and technology , as well as fuel profit and lapping last year ’ s WRAPTEXT lease accounting benefit . Excluding fuel , and the lease-related benefit , segment WRAPTEXT income decreased approximately 18 percent . WRAPTEXT Looking ahead to the fourth quarter , for the 13-week period ending January 27 , WRAPTEXT 2017 , we expect comp sales growth , excluding fuel , to be in a range of 1.0 to 1.5 WRAPTEXT percent . WRAPTEXT With that , let ’ s discuss our fourth quarter and full-year EPS guidance .

paragraph: WRAPTEXT Greg Foran and the team continue to innovate to improve the customer WRAPTEXT experience . In the last month , we opened two new Supercenters in Florida and Texas WRAPTEXT – with features like scan-and-go , touch-screens where customers can access more WRAPTEXT items on Walmart.com , virtual item displays , and an integrated health & wellness WRAPTEXT section . We ’ ve got quite a few experiments going on in the company these days and WRAPTEXT we ’ re learning at a faster rate . WRAPTEXT We ’ ve also been investing in price and customers are responding . We ’ re WRAPTEXT confident the continued execution of our strategy will drive sustainable growth in traffic WRAPTEXT and sales . WRAPTEXT Shifting gears to our International segment : WRAPTEXT I ’ m pleased to see the business delivering consistently solid sales results . While WRAPTEXT Walmex led the way this year , our performance was broad based . Ten of our 11 WRAPTEXT markets posted positive comp sales for the year and seven of those markets grew WRAPTEXT comp sales by more than four percent . WRAPTEXT At Walmex , we continued to see strong momentum in the business – across WRAPTEXT formats and countries . Comp store sales growth was over 7 percent this year and 14 WRAPTEXT percent on a two-year stack . WRAPTEXT In China , we announced an alliance with , and investment in , JD.com last WRAPTEXT summer , improving our e-commerce proposition and extending the reach of Walmart WRAPTEXT and Sam ’ s Clubs ’ brands to millions of new customers . We subsequently announced WRAPTEXT an increased ownership of JD.com to approximately 10 percent . And , we recently WRAPTEXT furthered this relationship with the launch of an exclusive Walmart Global imports store WRAPTEXT on JD.com Worldwide , which provides Chinese customers access to thousands of WRAPTEXT products imported from Walmart stores from around the world . We also announced an WRAPTEXT investment in last mile delivery-company New Dada , enabling two-hour delivery WRAPTEXT service from nearly 70 Walmart locations . China is a key growth market for our WRAPTEXT company , and we ’ re proud of how we ’ ve positioned the business to win . WRAPTEXT In the U.K. , we faced some challenges this past year and we ’ re addressing these WRAPTEXT with urgency . We ’ re encouraged comp store sales improved during the fourth quarter . I WRAPTEXT visited stores in the market a few weeks ago and the team has us pointed in the right WRAPTEXT direction . WRAPTEXT 3 WRAPTEXT We spent considerable time looking at our international portfolio last year , and WRAPTEXT we took some decisive action along the way . For example , our decisions to divest non- WRAPTEXT core businesses such as an apparel chain in Mexico and shopping malls in Chile were WRAPTEXT based not on the merits of their performance , rather their relevance to the portfolio – WRAPTEXT we must ensure that we focus on businesses that are core to what we do . WRAPTEXT Overall , I ’ m pleased with the consistently solid sales results in International . We WRAPTEXT have a strong business with good momentum . WRAPTEXT Moving to Sam ’ s Club , I ’ d like to start by thanking Roz Brewer for her WRAPTEXT leadership . Sam ’ s Club comps improved each quarter during the year last year and WRAPTEXT she has positioned the business for further progress . WRAPTEXT With Roz ’ s departure , we promoted John Furner to CEO of Sam ’ s Club . John ’ s WRAPTEXT been with the business since 1993 , working in Walmart U.S. , International and most WRAPTEXT recently as Sam ’ s Chief Merchandising Officer . He brings a unique set of experiences WRAPTEXT and a deep understanding of our company . He ’ s going to be a great leader for Sam ’ s . WRAPTEXT We ’ re pleased with our progress in technology at Sam ’ s , including the national WRAPTEXT launch of scan-and-go . E-commerce continues to grow with direct-to-home and Club WRAPTEXT pickup . While we have more work to do to deliver the results we expect to achieve , we WRAPTEXT believe we ’ re on the right track to win with members and accelerate growth . WRAPTEXT Finally , I ’ d like to discuss our progress in e-commerce – particularly in the U.S. WRAPTEXT We continue to invest in e-commerce to accelerate growth . We ’ re gaining traction WRAPTEXT and moving faster . We ’ re the second-largest U.S. online retailer by revenue , one of the WRAPTEXT top three online retailers by traffic and our Walmart app is among the top three apps in WRAPTEXT retail . We acquired Jet.com in the second half of last year and welcomed Marc Lore , WRAPTEXT the CEO of our U.S. e-commerce business . Marc is moving quickly . From a WRAPTEXT marketplace perspective , we now have over 35 million SKUs – more than quadrupling WRAPTEXT the number available at the beginning of the year . We recently announced free 2-day WRAPTEXT shipping on millions of items with a minimum order of $ 35 . And as you might expect , WRAPTEXT we ’ ve seen a nice uptick in our e-commerce business since this launch . The WRAPTEXT acquisitions of ShoeBuy and Moosejaw , in addition to Hayneedle , gave us immediate WRAPTEXT expertise and capabilities in new , more upscale categories of merchandise . We ’ re also WRAPTEXT leveraging the strengths of Walmart and Jet to make both platforms better – I ’ m excited WRAPTEXT about what ’ s to come . paragraph: WRAPTEXT Wal-Mart Stores , Inc. EVP & CFO WRAPTEXT Good morning everyone . WRAPTEXT As Doug mentioned , this has been an exciting year of transformation at Walmart . WRAPTEXT We ’ ve made strategic decisions revolving around the customer that will reposition the WRAPTEXT business for sustainable growth to win long term . We ’ re moving with speed to provide WRAPTEXT customers with a better offer through stores , mobile and e-commerce , and we ’ re WRAPTEXT confident this will drive value for shareholders . And , while going through this WRAPTEXT transformation , our financial strength serves as a great competitive advantage . WRAPTEXT For fiscal year 2017 , there were a number of accomplishments . paragraph: WRAPTEXT Walmart U.S. WRAPTEXT We ’ re pleased with the continued momentum in Walmart U.S. with steady WRAPTEXT improvement in stores , strong growth from e-commerce and growing contributions from WRAPTEXT the rollout of Online Grocery . All store formats had positive comp sales and e- WRAPTEXT commerce contributed approximately 40 basis points to the segment . We were WRAPTEXT particularly pleased with the positive comp in Grocery despite ongoing market deflation WRAPTEXT in food , which negatively impacted the Food comp by approximately 90 basis points . WRAPTEXT Gross margin decreased 8 basis points in the quarter . Savings from procuring WRAPTEXT merchandise as well as lower logistics costs benefitted the margin rate , but were more WRAPTEXT than offset by the continued execution of our price investment strategy and the timing WRAPTEXT of post-Holiday markdowns . We ’ re entering the new year in a very solid inventory WRAPTEXT position . For the year , Walmart U.S. gross margin increased 24 basis points . As a WRAPTEXT reminder , both fourth quarter and full-year comparisons included a $ 56 million impact WRAPTEXT last year related to store closures . WRAPTEXT Operating expenses increased 4.6 percent this quarter and 8.1 percent for the WRAPTEXT year primarily due to the associate wage rate increases as well as investments in WRAPTEXT technology and e-commerce . As I mentioned previously , in both this year and last year , WRAPTEXT we adjusted for discrete items . paragraph: WRAPTEXT Walmart International continued its solid sales performance this quarter . While WRAPTEXT Walmex results were the strongest with comp sales growth of seven percent , the solid WRAPTEXT international performance was fairly broad based . Ten of our 11 markets posted WRAPTEXT positive comp sales and six of those markets grew comps by more than four percent . WRAPTEXT For the fourth quarter , net sales grew 3.0 percent on a constant currency basis , WRAPTEXT while reported net sales declined 5.1 percent , impacted by a $ 2.6 billion currency WRAPTEXT headwind . For the year , net sales grew 3.0 percent on a constant currency basis , while WRAPTEXT reported net sales declined 5.9 percent , impacted by an $ 11 billion currency headwind . WRAPTEXT From a profitability standpoint , fourth quarter operating income increased 3.8 WRAPTEXT percent on a constant currency basis . I ’ d like to point out that there were a few items in WRAPTEXT the quarter that collectively had a negative impact to operating profit of approximately WRAPTEXT $ 100 million primarily because of adjustments to useful lives of certain assets and WRAPTEXT impairments in certain markets , which were partially offset by the gain from the sale of WRAPTEXT the remaining shopping malls in Chile , as mentioned last quarter . WRAPTEXT Operating income for the year increased 19.7 percent on a constant currency WRAPTEXT basis and increased 7.7 percent on a reported basis . As a reminder , these results WRAPTEXT include the gain associated with the sale of Yihaodian and the items mentioned above . WRAPTEXT 10 WRAPTEXT Let ’ s now turn to some brief highlights of the key markets . Please note that the WRAPTEXT accompanying financial presentation includes detailed information on our five major WRAPTEXT markets . The results discussed below are on a constant currency basis . WRAPTEXT Let ’ s begin with Walmex . Strong sales momentum continued across all formats , WRAPTEXT divisions , and countries with total sales growing nearly 9 percent in the quarter . In WRAPTEXT Mexico specifically , comp sales increased approximately 8 percent and outpaced all WRAPTEXT divisions of ANTAD , including self-service , specialty , and department stores . WRAPTEXT In Canada , net sales increased 2.7 percent and comp sales increased 0.2 WRAPTEXT percent . According to Nielsen , we continued to gain market share in traffic driving WRAPTEXT categories like food and consumables & health and wellness . WRAPTEXT Turning to the U.K. , net sales declined 0.6 percent and comp sales declined 2.9 WRAPTEXT percent in the quarter . We have a lot of work to do in this market , but we ’ re WRAPTEXT encouraged by some of the early signs of traction with improvements in the customer WRAPTEXT value proposition . WRAPTEXT In China , net sales grew 5.4 percent and comp sales increased 2.3 percent . WRAPTEXT Sales were solid across hypermarkets and Sam ’ s Club . We ’ re excited about the future WRAPTEXT of e-commerce in China . The strategic alliance with JD.com will continue to expand our WRAPTEXT presence throughout the country and offer customers new and exciting products WRAPTEXT through our flagship sites on JD ’ s platform . WRAPTEXT So , overall , we ’ re pleased with the consistent performance from our international WRAPTEXT portfolio and excited about the new fiscal year . WRAPTEXT Now , let ’ s turn to Sam ’ s Club . WRAPTEXT Sam ’ s Club WRAPTEXT At Sam ’ s Club , we ’ re pleased with the efforts underway to transform the WRAPTEXT business . We ’ re making progress in a number of areas , and we know we have to move WRAPTEXT faster to provide the value that members expect . WRAPTEXT 11 WRAPTEXT During the quarter , top-line performance was driven by an increase in comp WRAPTEXT sales , excluding fuel , of 2.4 percent . Samsclub.com GMV was strong , increasing by 25 WRAPTEXT percent , and Club Pickup also performed well . Operating income , excluding fuel , WRAPTEXT declined 5.1 percent for the quarter . Investments in associate wages pressured WRAPTEXT expenses , along with charges related to the impairment of clubs . In addition , this year ’ s WRAPTEXT fourth quarter included a $ 10 million discrete charge for discontinued real estate WRAPTEXT projects while last year ’ s fourth quarter included a $ 57 million discrete charge related WRAPTEXT to the impact of club closures . Excluding these discrete items , operating income would WRAPTEXT have declined 14.6 percent this quarter . WRAPTEXT For the year , net sales , excluding fuel , increased 1.8 percent to $ 53.3 billion . WRAPTEXT Operating income , excluding fuel , declined 7.3 percent . WRAPTEXT Looking ahead , for the 13-week period ending April 28 , 2017 , we expect a comp WRAPTEXT sales increase of around 1 percent . WRAPTEXT With that , let ’ s discuss guidance for the total company .

paragraph: WRAPTEXT Greg Foran and the team for a thoughtful plan and the energy they ’ re WRAPTEXT investing to lead the improvement . Greg , Marc Lore and the team continue WRAPTEXT to partner closely to serve our customers and figure out how to invent a WRAPTEXT 3 WRAPTEXT seamless shopping experience for customers across our apps , sites and WRAPTEXT stores . They are plowing new territory and I ’ m excited about what ’ s to WRAPTEXT come . WRAPTEXT In U.S. eCommerce , we like the traction and we are working hard to WRAPTEXT make even more improvements . Walmart.com launched two new initiatives WRAPTEXT in the quarter . First , we made the change to shipping terms at the WRAPTEXT beginning of the quarter . Customers don ’ t have to pay a membership fee to WRAPTEXT get two-day shipping on millions of items . Second , we recently began WRAPTEXT offering customers pick-up discounts on non-store items . Our stores are WRAPTEXT located within 10 miles of nearly 90 percent of the U.S. population—so this WRAPTEXT is convenient for many of our customers , and also saves them money when WRAPTEXT they order online and pick it up during their visit to our stores . WRAPTEXT Walmart.com now has 50 million first and third party items to choose WRAPTEXT from compared to 10 million at this time last year—so our assortment WRAPTEXT continues to ramp . We also made a few small , but strategic e-commerce WRAPTEXT acquisitions to further improve our assortment , while gaining critical WRAPTEXT category expertise in higher-margin categories like shoes and apparel . The WRAPTEXT acquisitions have received a lot of attention but our plan in e-commerce is WRAPTEXT not to buy our way to success . The majority of our growth is and will be WRAPTEXT organic . The acquisitions are helping us speed some things up . So overall , WRAPTEXT we ’ re making progress in providing the seamless shopping experience our WRAPTEXT customer ’ s desire and we will keep moving along this journey . WRAPTEXT Staying in the U.S. , let ’ s talk about Sam ’ s Club ; John Furner and WRAPTEXT team have hit the ground running . They are focused on members , WRAPTEXT merchandise and our associates . They achieved comp sales growth of 1.6 WRAPTEXT percent in the quarter led by 1.1 percent comp traffic growth and e- WRAPTEXT commerce GMV increased 21 percent . I ’ m excited by how we ’ re ramping WRAPTEXT up our private brand offering with improved quality and compelling new WRAPTEXT items . We ’ ve streamlined 20 private brands into one and will be WRAPTEXT introducing 300 new items this year that are branded Member ’ s Mark . The WRAPTEXT team at Sam ’ s Club is also taking important steps to simplify the business WRAPTEXT and give club managers more time on the floor to serve members . WRAPTEXT 4 WRAPTEXT Outside the U.S. , Dave Cheesewright and the team continued to WRAPTEXT deliver solid results . Overall constant-currency sales growth of less than 1 WRAPTEXT percent was negatively impacted by a couple of timing and divestiture- WRAPTEXT related issues that Brett will discuss -- but our underlying business continues WRAPTEXT to perform well . WRAPTEXT At Walmex , we continued to see strong momentum in the business— WRAPTEXT across formats and countries . Comp store sales growth was nearly 4 WRAPTEXT percent this year and 12 percent on a two-year stack . WRAPTEXT In April , I visited our businesses in China and Japan . China continues WRAPTEXT to be on fast-forward as it relates to all things digital including e-commerce . WRAPTEXT Operationally , our stores continue to improve and Sam ’ s Clubs are doing WRAPTEXT well . Working with JD.com and New Dada , China ’ s largest local on-demand WRAPTEXT logistics and grocery “ O – to – O , ” short for online to offline , delivery WRAPTEXT platform , we now offer one-hour delivery service from 80 stores . This is an WRAPTEXT improvement from the two-hour service we launched last year . We can see WRAPTEXT the benefits of omni-channel retail even more clearly in China than any WRAPTEXT other country where we operate . Given the urban density and automobile WRAPTEXT traffic challenges , stores serve the triple purpose of in-store shopping , WRAPTEXT pickup and delivery most effectively . WRAPTEXT I saw some similarities in Japan where stores are serving more than WRAPTEXT one purpose . In both markets , we ’ re piloting the use of stores as shipping WRAPTEXT locations and we ’ re learning what works best from a financial point of view WRAPTEXT in different types of store trade areas given how customer densities and WRAPTEXT travel distance can vary . WRAPTEXT Moving on to Canada , our business continues to perform well , WRAPTEXT delivering 12 consecutive quarters of positive comp sales . WRAPTEXT We ’ ve made some progress in the U.K. and the team is executing WRAPTEXT their plan . We are navigating our way back to a position of strength in that WRAPTEXT highly competitive market . When normalizing comp sales for the later WRAPTEXT Easter and Leap Day , we continued to see sequential improvement in the WRAPTEXT business , including customer traffic and ticket . WRAPTEXT 5 WRAPTEXT For the overall segment , International had another solid , predictable WRAPTEXT quarter . The team has done a nice job of growing profit faster than sales as WRAPTEXT they simultaneously shift our positioning in terms of store formats , on line WRAPTEXT grocery and e-commerce . WRAPTEXT In conclusion – we ’ re encouraged with our start to the year . WRAPTEXT We have a clear strategy we ’ re executing against . WRAPTEXT We ’ re uniquely positioned to deliver value through both our physical WRAPTEXT and digital assets . WRAPTEXT We have momentum across the business . We ’ re making progress WRAPTEXT and we know we ’ re on the right track as we work to become the WRAPTEXT most trusted retailer for our customers , provide ongoing opportunity WRAPTEXT for our associates and deliver results for our shareholders . WRAPTEXT We look forward to seeing many of you next month at our Annual WRAPTEXT Shareholders ’ meeting here in northwest Arkansas . Thanks for being WRAPTEXT interested in our business . WRAPTEXT Now , I ’ ll hand it over to Brett…

paragraph: WRAPTEXT Wal-Mart Stores , Inc. EVP & CFO WRAPTEXT Good morning , and thanks for joining us today . WRAPTEXT As I ’ ve been saying over the past few quarters – this an exciting time WRAPTEXT to be at Walmart , and we are delivering solid results . In the U.S. , important WRAPTEXT initiatives are underway both to accelerate growth in e-commerce and drive WRAPTEXT traffic to our stores . Most of our key international markets continue to WRAPTEXT perform well , and top-line performance at Sam ’ s Club remains solid . On WRAPTEXT today ’ s call I ’ m going to cover our consolidated results from the first WRAPTEXT quarter , talk about e-commerce in the U.S. and then provide details on our WRAPTEXT operating segments . We will discuss the consolidated results in the context WRAPTEXT of our financial framework of : WRAPTEXT Strong , efficient growth WRAPTEXT Operating discipline , and WRAPTEXT Strategic capital allocation WRAPTEXT 6 WRAPTEXT Let ’ s start with our consolidated results… . EPS was $ 1.00 , which is at WRAPTEXT the top end of our guidance of $ 0.90 to $ 1.00 and 2 percent higher than WRAPTEXT last year . This marks the first quarterly EPS increase in more than two WRAPTEXT years on an underlying basis . On a constant currency basis , total revenue WRAPTEXT increased 2.5 percent to $ 118.8 billion as we saw solid top-line WRAPTEXT performance across the business . Walmart U.S. continued its momentum WRAPTEXT with comps of 1.4 percent , while Sam ’ s Club posted comp sales , without WRAPTEXT fuel , of 1.6 percent . In Walmart International , 7 of our 11 markets reported WRAPTEXT positive comps , even as the timing of Easter and last year ’ s Leap Day WRAPTEXT negatively impacted results . The U.S. eCommerce GMV growth WRAPTEXT accelerated significantly , up approximately 69 percent . Through the lens of WRAPTEXT strong , efficient growth , I ’ m pleased with the results . WRAPTEXT Gross profit margin increased 1 basis point during the quarter . The WRAPTEXT rate for Walmart U.S. was flat , while Walmart International was up slightly . WRAPTEXT In regard to operating discipline…while we didn ’ t leverage expenses WRAPTEXT on a consolidated level primarily due to investments in e-commerce and WRAPTEXT technology , I ’ m pleased that we leveraged in our U.S. stores . We ’ re WRAPTEXT making progress towards our objective of slightly leveraging expenses on a WRAPTEXT consolidated basis for the year . WRAPTEXT We continued to generate strong operating and free cash flow in the WRAPTEXT quarter -- $ 5.4 billion and $ 3.4 billion , respectively . Cash flow was down WRAPTEXT year on year primarily due to an increase in incentive payments , as well as WRAPTEXT a comparison against significant working capital improvements last year . WRAPTEXT As we strategically allocate capital , our first priority is to invest in improving WRAPTEXT and growing the business . In the quarter , we completed remodels of 95 WRAPTEXT stores globally , and in the U.S. we continued to expand our online grocery WRAPTEXT service to include nearly 670 locations . We also added a limited number of WRAPTEXT new stores , and made two relatively small acquisitions in the e-commerce WRAPTEXT space , Moosejaw and ModCloth , to expand our online selection and WRAPTEXT improve our category expertise in important areas like apparel and outdoor WRAPTEXT gear . In addition to investing in the business , we returned $ 3.7 billion to WRAPTEXT shareholders through dividends and share buybacks . WRAPTEXT 7 WRAPTEXT Before I get to our operating segments , I ’ ll talk about Walmart U.S. WRAPTEXT eCommerce . As a reminder , the results include all web-initiated WRAPTEXT transactions including those through Walmart.com such as ship to home , WRAPTEXT ship to store , pick up today and online grocery , as well as transactions WRAPTEXT through Jet.com and the other sites in our family of brands . WRAPTEXT Year-over-year growth in GMV was approximately 69 percent , WRAPTEXT including acquisitions . The majority of this growth was organic through WRAPTEXT Walmart.com . This is extraordinary growth , and we ’ re pleased with the WRAPTEXT traction we ’ re generating across our e-commerce offerings . We ’ ve recently WRAPTEXT introduced free 2-day shipping with a basket size of $ 35 or more on select WRAPTEXT items , and launched a new service called Pickup Discount , where WRAPTEXT customers can order non-store products online and receive a discount for WRAPTEXT picking these items up in our stores . This is a service that ’ s convenient for WRAPTEXT customers and saves them money . WRAPTEXT Let ’ s now discuss the results for each operating segment in more WRAPTEXT detail , starting with Walmart U.S.

paragraph: WRAPTEXT Walmart U.S. continues to perform well with comp sales growth , WRAPTEXT excluding fuel , of 2.1 percent . We WRAPTEXT aim to make shopping easy , fast , friendly and fun for customers , and our WRAPTEXT team continues to make progress towards that goal . I continue to be WRAPTEXT impressed by the progress the team is making on inventory management . WRAPTEXT They ’ ve put together a string of 12 quarters of reduced comp store WRAPTEXT inventory while maintaining strong in-stock levels . eCommerce sales WRAPTEXT accelerated in the first quarter with 33 percent growth , and we expect to WRAPTEXT grow sales about 40 percent for the full year . WRAPTEXT Outside of the U.S. , eight of eleven markets posted positive comp sales , WRAPTEXT including our four largest markets of Mexico , U.K. , China and Canada . WRAPTEXT 2 WRAPTEXT It was exciting to be in India last week with the Flipkart team for our WRAPTEXT announcement of Walmart ’ s investment . eCommerce in India is growing WRAPTEXT rapidly , and we expect it to grow at four times the rate of overall retail . WRAPTEXT Flipkart is already capturing a large portion of this growth and is well- WRAPTEXT positioned to accelerate into the future . So , this is an investment in a large , WRAPTEXT fast-growing country , with an innovative business positioned in the growth WRAPTEXT area of eCommerce , and with an opportunity to be a positive force for good WRAPTEXT as we create shared value for years to come . We ’ re excited about what the WRAPTEXT future holds . WRAPTEXT These changes are consistent with our strategy to continually review WRAPTEXT our portfolio and position the company for growth . We are encouraged by WRAPTEXT the health of the overall business and remain confident in our ability to win WRAPTEXT over the long term while delivering results in the short term . WRAPTEXT Let me mention a little more about each area of the business . WRAPTEXT I ’ ll start with Walmart U.S. WRAPTEXT In addition to comp sales growth of 2.1 percent , more people WRAPTEXT shopped with us as comp traffic improved 0.8 percent . Comp sales were WRAPTEXT trending higher through early April , but general merchandise sales and WRAPTEXT traffic were somewhat negatively impacted by unseasonably cool weather WRAPTEXT in April . WRAPTEXT Overall , the stores business is getting stronger . We ’ re using WRAPTEXT technology in more ways to simplify work for associates so they can better WRAPTEXT serve customers . This is also helping with inventory flow and expense WRAPTEXT management . The previously-announced starting hourly wage rate WRAPTEXT increase took effect in February . But because we ’ re operating more WRAPTEXT efficiently , we were able to leverage expenses in our stores this quarter . WRAPTEXT We ’ re pleased that U.S. eCommerce delivered sales growth of 33 WRAPTEXT percent with strength at Walmart.com and online grocery . Last week , Marc WRAPTEXT and the team launched our newly redesigned Walmart website and app . WRAPTEXT Customers are responding well to the refreshed , personalized and WRAPTEXT engaging experience . We ’ ve also added new brands to Walmart.com and WRAPTEXT the redesigned site will include a new Lord & Taylor store where customers WRAPTEXT can shop a broader assortment of premium brands . Overall , our WRAPTEXT 3 WRAPTEXT Walmart.com assortment offers more than 75 million first and third party WRAPTEXT items available for customers . WRAPTEXT We ’ re on track to increase online grocery pickup by around 1,000 WRAPTEXT stores this year to reach more than 2,100 locations across the U.S. with WRAPTEXT this service . We ’ re also rolling out grocery delivery to about 800 stores by WRAPTEXT year-end , allowing us to cover 40 percent of the U.S. population with WRAPTEXT delivery . The eCommerce food business we ’ ve been building is important WRAPTEXT not only because of the volume it ’ s driving but , strategically , it ’ s helping to WRAPTEXT grow the number of omni-channel customers we serve . You ’ ll remember WRAPTEXT from our previous presentations that omni-channel customers spend almost WRAPTEXT twice as much with us , and they also spend more in stores even after WRAPTEXT becoming omni-channel customers . In addition to grocery pickup , we have WRAPTEXT nearly 200 automated pick up towers in stores now and we ’ ll have about WRAPTEXT 700 stores covered by year-end . Customers love to have choices in how WRAPTEXT they shop and we ’ re positioning to serve them well . WRAPTEXT Sam ’ s Club had a strong quarter with comp sales growth , excluding WRAPTEXT fuel and tobacco , of 5.2 percent led by strong traffic growth of 5.6 percent , WRAPTEXT and eCommerce sales increased about 25 percent . Keep in mind that our WRAPTEXT decision to remove tobacco from certain clubs will be a headwind to WRAPTEXT reported comp sales throughout the year , and pressured the first quarter WRAPTEXT comp by approximately 140 basis points . Including that impact , Sam ’ s WRAPTEXT comp sales , excluding fuel grew 3.8 percent . paragraph: WRAPTEXT Judith McKenna , Walmart International ’ s new CEO , has hit the WRAPTEXT ground running with the big announcements related to the U.K. and India . WRAPTEXT She ’ s already been to Canada , China , the U.K. , India and Mexico since WRAPTEXT taking the role . This segment continued to deliver solid results with WRAPTEXT constant-currency sales growth of 4.5 percent . Walmex led the way with WRAPTEXT another strong quarter as comp sales grew 9.5 percent . We benefited in WRAPTEXT Mexico , as did several of our International markets , from the earlier Easter WRAPTEXT but traffic was strong even considering that benefit . WRAPTEXT 4 WRAPTEXT In March , I visited our business in China . Our Walmart stores are WRAPTEXT getting stronger and Sam ’ s Club continues to go from strength to strength . I WRAPTEXT really like the progress Sam ’ s China is making one item at a time . In WRAPTEXT addition , as we partner with JD Daojia , China ’ s largest local on-demand WRAPTEXT logistics and grocery delivery platform , we ’ ve expanded our one-hour WRAPTEXT delivery service , which is now available from 177 stores . During my visit , WRAPTEXT we opened our first small supermarket store format . Customer response WRAPTEXT was terrific . We ’ re able to offer over ninety percent of the items we carry in WRAPTEXT the supermarket via eCommerce for delivery . The supermarket offers WRAPTEXT delivery in less than 30 minutes . The fastest delivery on opening day from WRAPTEXT online order to customer door was 9 minutes ! We believe there are WRAPTEXT opportunities to selectively expand this format in key regions . We can WRAPTEXT certainly see the benefits of making our stores , websites and apps WRAPTEXT seamless with the capabilities of in-store shopping , picking in store and WRAPTEXT delivering . We ’ re learning a lot from China these days . WRAPTEXT In Canada , we ’ re investing in price and customers are responding as WRAPTEXT we continued to gain market share in key traffic driving categories like food WRAPTEXT and consumables . WRAPTEXT In the U.K. , we saw sequential improvement in the business as comp WRAPTEXT sales increased for the fourth consecutive quarter . We continue to remain WRAPTEXT focused on improving the customer experience in our stores and providing WRAPTEXT value for customers by investing in lower prices . WRAPTEXT This quarter we hosted suppliers and environmental leaders here in WRAPTEXT Bentonville as part of “ Project Gigaton , ” which we launched last year to WRAPTEXT remove one gigaton of emissions from our supply chain by 2030 . We also WRAPTEXT launched Project Gigaton in China this quarter . We were pleased to WRAPTEXT announce that in the first year we already have over 400 suppliers on board WRAPTEXT and suppliers have reported 20 million metric tons of greenhouse gas WRAPTEXT emission reductions from our supply chain . We ’ re also excited to be WRAPTEXT doubling our renewables capacity in the U.S. with more of our energy now WRAPTEXT coming from wind and solar . In addition , we announced we ’ re doubling the WRAPTEXT number of electric vehicle charging stations at Walmart and Sam ’ s Club . WRAPTEXT You can now drive coast to coast in an electric vehicle and charge your car WRAPTEXT at our stores and clubs . WRAPTEXT 5 WRAPTEXT In closing , we have good momentum in the business , we ’ re focused on WRAPTEXT serving customers more effectively and we ’ re executing on our strategy . WRAPTEXT We look forward to seeing many of you next month at our Shareholders ’ WRAPTEXT Meeting here in northwest Arkansas . Thanks for your interest in Walmart .
